hero.title: Got lost in the vastness of the internet?
hero.text: Welcome here stranger! I'm a soon-to-be software engineer who loves to build things for the web. I'm currently working on some cool projects and learning new technologies. I'm also open to new opportunities, so feel free to contact me if you want to work together.

game.text: Or don't, it's up to you. I'm not your boss. Kidding, I'm your boss now. Play the game. But, wait, it seems like the game is not working. I guess you have to check out my projects instead.
